notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, X.W., and U.F.; methodology, U.F. conducted the experiments, S.J., constructed the Mx1 plasmids and L.X. and X.C. raised NP antibodies; software, U.F., H.Z., Z.Z., and X.-F.W.; validation, H.Z., and Z.Z.; writing—original draft preparation, U.F.; writing—review and editing, X.W.
